name: zeldafop.zip
items: The Legend of Zelda Fragments of Power.sh

attr.title: The Legend of Zelda Fragments of Power
attr.desc: Based on the original Zelda NES game, think of it as a third campaign with a few surprises. Takes place after the second game. Includes a randomizer mode for extra runs, though it is recommended the original game is played first.
attr.inst: Download free at itch.io https://vennyhedgie.itch.io/fragments-of-power -Locate data.win and both audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat then place them in gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://vennyhedgie.itch.io/fragments-of-power) -Locate data.win and both audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat then place them in gamedata folder.
